name: Zegundis
content:
Zegundis was a female Dressellian mechanic who worked at Paolo's Chop Shop on Nar Shaddaa. When Zegundis was a youngling, Paolo passed away and Zegundis eventually took up ownership of his shop, where she employed the Kaleesh Ishtah.
In 19 BBY, Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi sold the Belbullab-22 starfighter Soulless One to Zegundis while on his way to deliver the infant Luke Skywalker to the Lars family on Tatooine. Kenobi then used the Force to erase Zegundis's memory of their interaction.
